title: Bug 134949: Themes nested in other library
description: Bug 134949: Themes nested in other library. Details: Themes nest in other library. Step:1.
OB: When I open the Library tree of Library A in the library explorer and drop the themes from Library B into the layout, an error message pops up stating that the library namespace 'B' already exists.
EB: I expect that I should be able to use this method of nesting themes from Library B within Library A without encountering an error about existing namespaces.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Library tree of Library A in the library explorer
2. Drop the themes from Library B into the layout
3. Observe the error message stating that the library namespace 'B' already exists
